Subskills.name: Wielding The Saw
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by chainsaw massacre while you are wielding a chainsaw.

Subskills.name: Saw Through The Woods
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of chainsaw massacre.

Subskills.name: Logger's Lil Helpers
Subskills.description: Additionally summons multiple chainsaws that spin around you at different speeds while chainsaw massacre is active.

Subskills.name: Sawing Execution
Subskills.description: Chainsaw massacre now executes targets below a certain percentage of life.

Subskills.name: Final Stand
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by chainsaw massacre's ending whirl.

Subskills.name: Optimal Working Hours
Subskills.description: Decreases duration but increases damage dealt each second spent spinning.

Subskills.name: Overtime
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of chainsaw massacre.

Subskills.name: Woodcutter's Expertise
Subskills.description: Gain absolute control of the spinning dealing increased damage and inflict bleeding on hit.

Subskills.name: Resilient Sustain
Subskills.description: Increases your life steal and mana steal while spinning.

Subskills.name: Logging Machine
Subskills.description: Increases spinning speed of chainsaw massacre.

Subskills.name: Calling in Sick
Subskills.description: Decreases the duration of chainsaw massacre.

Subskills.name: Raging Sawblades
Subskills.description: Perform the ending whirl frequently while spinning.

Subskills.name: Standstill Focus
Subskills.description: Spin in place dealing increased damage. Each kill increases the area of effect radius of chainsaw massacre.
